author: AddictedToStyrene
title: Secret Pyramid Building Set!
review:
The fundamental Lego brick - 2 x 4 - in Tan. That colour would be sacrilege if you started playing with Lego before the 1990s. How things have changed!

However, if your Lego collection had nothing but these, you could still build something brilliant. That's the beauty of Lego!

This is a supplemental pack of 50 tan bricks, so it would be very good for addition to Adventurers, Indiana Jones and similar themes, or any nature, building, construction or wildlife theme. Build walls, houses, statues, roadways, etc.

With this set you can build a hollow pyramid five bricks high, with a few bricks leftover to make some very rectangular statues. Add minifigures to worship ancient Egyptian Gods or perform Aztec rituals. Take it apart and build a suntanned Stone Henge.

(I have only rated this set low on 'value for money' because you can buy 2 x 4 bricks for about 5c each on Bricklink.)
